## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bc1d41f48feb6046e7a27f7a15290bb4b1b479f102ed0d6ebd6cdc4bc89d8210)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@get-bridge/tapestry-sdk' @ 99.99.991 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
